name: GetTagsFromItem
description:
Retrieve all tags from a specified item on a board.

Use this tool to get a list of all tags associated with a specific item on a Miro board. This requires read access to the board via the appropriate scope and is subject to Level 1 rate limiting.

parameters.name: board_identifier
parameters.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board containing the item for which tags are to be retrieved.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board with the item whose tags you want to retrieve.

parameters.name: item_identifier
parameters.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the item whose tags are to be retrieved from the board.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the item whose tags you want to retrieve.
